GSD.description:
selinux: allow FIOCLEX and FIONCLEX with policy capability

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit b531d4ead7990638c4d0402de1f6b3c6f4aa81be. For more details please see the references link.
